Refund Policy

Returns

The return policy lasts 30 days. If 30 days have gone by since a purchase, unfortunately we cannot issue a refund or exchange.

To be eligible for a return, an item must be unused and in the same condition that it was received. It must also be in the original packaging.

Several types of goods are exempt from being returned. Perishable goods such as food, flowers, newspapers or magazines cannot be returned.

Additional non-returnable items include:

  • Intimate or sanitary goods
  • Gift cards
  • Downloadable software products
  • Some health and personal care items

To complete a return, we require a receipt or proof of purchase.

Please do not send your purchase back to the manufacturer.

There are certain situations where only partial refunds are granted: (if applicable)

  • Book with obvious signs of use
  • CD, DVD, VHS tape, software, video game, cassette tape, or vinyl record that has been opened.
  • Any item not in its original condition, is damaged or missing parts for reasons not due to our error.
  • Any item that is returned more than 30 days after delivery

Refunds (if applicable)

Once a return is received and inspected, we will send an email to notify you that we have received the returned item. We will also notify you of the approval or rejection of the refund. If the refund is approved, then it will be processed, and a credit will automatically be applied to the credit card or original method of payment, within a certain amount of days.

Late or missing refunds (if applicable)

If a refund hasn't been received, first check the payment bank account again. Then contact the payment credit card company, it may take some time before the refund is officially posted. Next contact the bank. There is often some processing time before a refund is posted. If all of this has been done, and the refund still has not been received, please contact us at team@eeosk.com.

Sale items (if applicable)

Only regular priced items may be refunded, unfortunately sale items cannot be refunded.

Exchanges (if applicable)

We only replace items if they are defective or damaged. If an exchange is needed for the same item, send us an email at team@eeosk.com.

Shipping

To return a product, contact us at team@eeosk.com.

The customer will be responsible for paying for shipping costs for returning an item. Shipping costs are non-refundable. If a refund is issued, the cost of return shipping will be deducted from the refund.

Depending on delivery location, the time it may take for the exchanged product to arrive may vary.

When shipping an item over $75, consider using a trackable shipping service or purchasing shipping insurance. We donâ€™t guarantee that we will receive your returned item.
